main.name: Shiv Palit
main.description: I am a data scientist with professional experience building large-scale ML/AI solutions, developing data platforms, and driving customer experience analytics across media, consulting, and investment sectors
main.bio:
I'm a data scientist with a product mindset, passionate about building scalable AI/ML solutions that unlock insights and drive impact. Currently at Warner Bros. Discovery, I lead the development of machine learning models and data platforms that power customer experience analytics across global streaming brands. I enjoy working at the intersection of data engineering, modeling, and product strategy - translating messy real-world problems into clean, efficient systems.

My primary toolkit includes Python, Docker, and AWS. I'm especially comfortable working with LLMs, clustering & classification algorithms, and streamlining complex pipelines. I love designing intuitive tools that make data accessible to everyone, from analysts to executives. 

Curious by nature and collaborative by default, I thrive in fast-paced environments where I can work cross-functionally, mentor others, and continuously learn. Whether it's scaling up a data platform or experimenting with a new model architecture, I'm always looking for ways to make data more actionable and impactful.

work.title: Senior Product Manager, CX Data & AI
work.description: Lead Warner Bros. Discovery’s CX Data & AI organization, overseeing all CX data products and enterprise AI tools across major brands. Manage multiple engineering teams to deliver scalable ML/AI solutions and real-time analytics from 10K+ daily customer contacts. Architected LLM-based classifiers and clustering models, achieving up to $1.5M in operational savings annually. Built infrastructure with Airflow, Databricks, and Looker to support executive decisions. Implementing WBD’s first customer-facing GenAI assistant and shaping responsible AI standards in collaboration with Legal and Privacy teams.

work.title: Associate Analytics Consultant
work.description: Led implementation of Looker BI platform for B2C services client, driving 285% subscription revenue growth through advanced data modeling and analytics. Developed comprehensive subscription analytics and forecasting models using SQL and Python, while partnering with executive leadership to define KPIs and optimize data infrastructure. Directed integration of multiple data sources into centralized warehouse using GCP and Airflow.

work.title: Data Science Engineer
work.description: Engineered automated ETL pipelines and analytics dashboards processing 100K+ daily data points from 25+ alternative sources, saving analysts 6 hours daily. Developed clustering algorithms and sentiment analysis tools to identify trading patterns and track public opinion on portfolio companies. Created proprietary Bloomberg application for analyzing forward valuation metrics and monitoring business activity through non-traditional data sources.
